rightValue.stringValue: I am currently under debt review
I am currently under sequestration in terms of a court order

Flow.description:
DB: 11 aug
Flow Description: Creates a Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity and is launched from the Wrap Up Opportunity flow
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity record page.

formulas.name: Link_PreApprovalOpp
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!preApprovalOppVar}, "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: missingQuestions
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Marital_agreement__c}, ""), "Marital Agreement" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.In_what_capacity_are_you_buying__c}, ""), "In what capacity are you buying"+ BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Do_you_have_a_South_African_ID_number__c}, ""), "Do you have a South African ID"+ BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Nationality__c}, ""), "Nationality" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.What_is_your_employment_status__c}, ""), "Employment Status" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.What_is_your_credit_status__c}, ""), "Credit Status" + BR(), null)

Flow.label: Create Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity

value.stringValue: Self employed / does not meet the minimum criteria

fields.name: closedSelfEmployed
fields.fieldText:
The following Opportunity stage has been updated to Closed Lost:


Opportunity: {!Get_Updated_Opp_Self_Employed.Name}

Status: {!Get_Updated_Opp_Self_Employed.Status__c}

Employment Status: Self-Employed


The Opportunity should be referred to a Bond Specialist.

value.stringValue: Create Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity Workflow

fields.name: messageHelp
fields.fieldText:
The following additional Closed Opportunities exist on {!generalOpportunityNameFormula}:


Would you like to create a new Pre-Approval Opportunity for this General Opportunity?

value.stringValue: Create Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity Workflow

fields.name: messageHelp_0
fields.fieldText: The following additional Opportunities already exist on {!generalOpportunityNameFormula} :

fields.name: oppErrDisp
fields.fieldText: You must select an Opportunity to use the "Continue with existing Opportunity" option

value.stringValue: Create Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity Workflow

fields.name: inProgressMsg_0
fields.fieldText:
The following additional Opportunities are in progress for: {!generalOpportunityNameFormula}


You are not allowed to Create a new Opportunity while another is in progress.


If the stage is set to Closed, you will be able to Create a new Opportunity for this existing General Opportunity.

fields.name: requiredQuestions
fields.fieldText:
The following Interview questions are mandatory when converting to Pre-Approval:

{!missingQuestions}

fields.name: Do_you_earn_additional_income_from
fields.fieldText: Do you earn additional income from:

fields.name: poorCreditPrompt
fields.fieldText:
The Opportunity stage for {!Get_Updated_Opp.Name} has been updated to Closed Lost:


Status: {!Get_Updated_Opp.Status__c}

Credit Check Result: Red
